text_0: A spacious kitchen with a wooden table in the center, a refrigerator to the left, and white cabinets lining the white walls. Sunlight streams through a window above the sink, casting a warm glow on the checkered floor. Jerry, the brown mouse, is on the kitchen table, standing next to a yellow wedge of cheese, looking around with a smug expression on his face. Jerry glances from side to side, then carefully picks up the slice of cheese that is nearly as big as him, holding it with both paws against his chest.
text_1: A spacious kitchen with a wooden table in the center, a refrigerator to the left, and white cabinets lining the white walls. Sunlight streams through a window above the sink, casting a warm glow on the checkered floor. Tom, the blue-gray cat, is perched on a shelf above the kitchen table, his body low and hidden in shadow, eyes fixed downward at Jerry. Jerry, the brown mouse, stands on the kitchen table, holding the wedge of cheese in his paws, unaware of Tom's presence above him. The camera angle widens slightly to show both Tom watching intently from above and Jerry below, as Jerry begins to walk toward the edge of the table, cheese clutched to his chest.
text_2: The kitchen floor with a small mouse hole in the baseboard of a white wall. The hole has slightly worn edges and a small crack extending from its top. Jerry, the brown mouse, approaches the mouse hole with the cheese wedge held tightly in his paws, his whiskers twitching with anticipation. Jerry reaches the mouse hole and steps inside, his tail being the last part of him to disappear into the darkness of the hole, the cheese wedge barely fitting through the small opening.
text_3: Inside the mouse hole is a narrow, earth-toned tunnel with rough-textured walls curving slightly to the right. A dim light illuminates the path ahead. Jerry, the brown mouse, walks through the tunnel holding his prized cheese wedge, his shadow cast against the curved wall of the tunnel. The camera follows Jerry from behind as he walks confidently down the tunnel, his tail swaying gently from side to side, heading toward the light at the end.
text_4: A cozy mouse bedroom with a matchbox bed in the corner, a thimble nightstand, and a small table made from a spool of thread. A postage stamp serves as a wall decoration, and a soft glow comes from a tiny lamp. Jerry, the brown mouse, enters through a doorway, still holding the cheese wedge, and stops abruptly with a look of shock on his face. The camera pans to reveal Tom, the blue-gray cat, sitting comfortably on Jerry's matchbox bed, smugly holding up his paw, his claws extended slightly.
text_5: A cozy mouse bedroom with a matchbox bed in the corner, a thimble nightstand, and a small table made from a spool of thread. A postage stamp serves as a wall decoration, and a soft glow comes from a tiny lamp. Tom, the blue-gray cat, sits on Jerry's matchbox bed with a satisfied grin, the cheese wedge now held between his paws. Jerry, the brown mouse, stands in the doorway, his empty paws dropping to his sides, his expression changing from shock to dismay. The camera focuses on Tom's smug face as he raises one eyebrow at Jerry, then slowly brings the cheese closer to his mouth while Jerry watches helplessly.

text_0: A spacious kitchen with white countertops, wooden cabinets, and a tiled floor. A refrigerator stands against the left wall, and a sink is visible on the right side of the counter. Tom, the blue-gray cat, stands attentively near the kitchen counter, his eyes fixed on a large yellow piece of cheese sitting on the white countertop. Jerry, the brown mouse, approaches the cheese from the other side of the counter, his small paws reaching toward the prized food. Jerry slowly extends his paws and grasps the large piece of cheese, lifting it up while keeping his eyes on Tom who begins to move toward him.
text_1: A spacious kitchen with white countertops, wooden cabinets, and a tiled floor. A refrigerator stands against the left wall, and a sink is visible on the right side of the counter. Jerry, the brown mouse, clutches the large yellow piece of cheese in his tiny paws as he moves toward a small mouse hole visible in the baseboard of the wall. Tom, the blue-gray cat, extends his paw toward Jerry, his body leaning forward with determination. Jerry moves toward the mouse hole while Tom's paw stretches out behind him, the camera following Jerry's path to the mouse hole.
text_2: A spacious kitchen with white countertops, wooden cabinets, and a tiled floor. A refrigerator stands against the left wall, and a sink is visible on the right side of the counter. Jerry, the brown mouse, reaches the mouse hole with the large yellow cheese in his paws and slips through the opening. Tom, the blue-gray cat, lunges forward with his paw extended, missing Jerry by inches as his paw hits the wall next to the mouse hole. The camera zooms in on Tom's frustrated expression as his paw remains pressed against the wall beside the mouse hole.
text_3: A sunny garden with green grass, colorful flowers, and a stone birdbath in the background. A small tree stands to the left, and a garden fence is visible on the right side. Jerry, the brown mouse, sits on a small patch of grass, holding the large yellow piece of cheese in his paws with a satisfied expression. Jerry lifts the cheese toward his mouth, preparing to take a bite as he sits comfortably on the grass. The camera frames Jerry from a medium distance, capturing his small figure against the garden backdrop.
text_4: A sunny garden with green grass, colorful flowers, and a stone birdbath in the background. A small tree stands to the left, and a garden fence is visible on the right side. Jerry, the brown mouse, sits on the patch of grass with the cheese in his paws, unaware of movement beneath him. Tom's blue-gray paw slowly emerges from the ground directly under Jerry, the dirt moving aside as the paw rises upward. The camera maintains its position as Tom's paw pushes up through the soil, beginning to lift Jerry from below.
text_5: A sunny garden with green grass, colorful flowers, and a stone birdbath in the background. A small tree stands to the left, and a garden fence is visible on the right side. Jerry, the brown mouse, and his piece of yellow cheese are sent airborne as Tom's paw fully emerges from the ground. The cheese and Jerry separate mid-air, both traveling in an arc toward the stone birdbath. The camera pans upward to follow Jerry and the cheese as they fly through the air toward the waiting water of the birdbath.

text_0: A bright, spacious kitchen with white tiled floors and yellow walls. A refrigerator stands on the left, a wooden table in the center, and cabinets line the right wall with a window above the sink. Tom, the blue-gray cat, stands by the wooden table in the center of the kitchen, holding a yellow sponge and a small paint brush with yellow paint. Tom carefully applies yellow paint to the sponge, occasionally looking over his shoulder toward where Jerry might appear from, his whiskers twitching with anticipation as he works.
text_1: A bright, spacious kitchen with white tiled floors and yellow walls. A refrigerator stands on the left, a wooden table in the center, and cabinets line the right wall with a window above the sink. Tom, the blue-gray cat, quietly approaches a small plate of cheese on the kitchen counter, holding the yellow-painted sponge in his paw. Tom gently removes the real cheese from the plate and replaces it with the painted sponge, arranging it to look identical to the original cheese, while the camera zooms in slightly to focus on his precise movements.
text_2: A bright, spacious kitchen with white tiled floors and yellow walls. A refrigerator stands on the left, a wooden table in the center, and cabinets line the right wall with a window above the sink. Tom, the blue-gray cat, tiptoes backward away from the counter where the fake cheese sits, his eyes fixed on his handiwork as a mischievous smile spreads across his face. Tom slides behind the refrigerator, leaving only his head peeking out from the side, his eyes narrowed in anticipation and a paw covering his mouth to suppress his snickering.
text_3: A cozy living room with a burgundy sofa against the back wall, a wooden coffee table in the center, and a fireplace on the right wall. A small archway on the left leads to the kitchen, and a round rug covers part of the hardwood floor. Jerry, the brown mouse, walks confidently across the coffee table toward what appears to be a small wedge of yellow cheese sitting on a saucer. The camera follows Jerry as he approaches the cheese, his tiny paws extended forward in excitement, his whiskers twitching in anticipation of the tasty treat.
text_4: A cozy living room with a burgundy sofa against the back wall, a wooden coffee table in the center, and a fireplace on the right wall. A small archway on the left leads to the kitchen, and a round rug covers part of the hardwood floor. Jerry, the brown mouse, sits beside the yellow object on the coffee table, holding it up to his mouth and taking a substantial bite from the corner. Jerry's eyes suddenly bulge outward in shock, his cheeks puffing as he realizes he's bitten into a sponge, while the camera zooms in to capture his expression of disgust and surprise.
text_5: A bright, spacious kitchen with white tiled floors and yellow walls. A refrigerator stands on the left, a wooden table in the center, and cabinets line the right wall with a window above the sink. Jerry, the brown mouse, stands at the entrance to the kitchen, holding the yellow-painted sponge with a visible bite mark, his face contorted in anger with steam visibly rising from his head. Jerry stomps his foot repeatedly on the kitchen floor, his free paw balled into a tiny fist, while the camera pans to show Tom's tail still visible behind the refrigerator.

text_0: A bright kitchen with white tiled floors, wooden cabinets, and a pale yellow wall. A small red cushion sits in the corner on the floor next to the refrigerator. Tom, the blue-gray cat, is curled up on the red cushion with his eyes closed, his chest rising and falling with each breath as he sleeps peacefully. Jerry, the brown mouse, carefully emerges from a small hole in the baseboard, his eyes fixed on a large piece of cheese sitting on a plate on the kitchen counter. The camera follows Jerry as he slowly and cautiously tiptoes across the kitchen floor, glancing nervously at the sleeping Tom.
text_1: A bright kitchen with white tiled floors, wooden cabinets, and a pale yellow wall. A small red cushion sits in the corner on the floor next to the refrigerator. Tom, the blue-gray cat, continues to sleep soundly on the red cushion, his tail occasionally twitching as he dreams. Jerry, the brown mouse, stands at the base of the kitchen counter, looking up at the cheese plate that sits above him on the countertop. Jerry carefully scales up the side of the kitchen counter using a dish towel that hangs down, his tiny paws gripping the fabric as he climbs upward with determination.
text_2: A bright kitchen with white tiled floors, wooden cabinets, and a pale yellow wall. A small cheese plate sits on the edge of the kitchen counter with a large yellow wedge of cheese. Jerry, the brown mouse, stands on the kitchen counter next to the cheese plate, his eyes wide with delight at his discovery. Jerry gently breaks off a small chunk of the cheese with both paws, then holds it close to his chest while a visible aroma, illustrated as wispy lines, drifts from the cheese across the room. The camera pans to follow the cheese aroma as it wafts toward the sleeping Tom.
text_3: A bright kitchen with white tiled floors, wooden cabinets, and a pale yellow wall. The cheese plate sits on the counter with a piece missing from the yellow wedge. Tom, the blue-gray cat, sits upright on the red cushion, his nose twitching and his eyes now wide open as he notices the cheese smell in the air. Jerry, the brown mouse, is halfway across the kitchen floor, clutching his cheese chunk while walking slowly toward his mouse hole. Tom's ears perk up as he spots Jerry, and he rises to all fours, his tail straightening behind him as he glares at the mouse with the stolen cheese.
text_4: A sunlit garden with lush green grass, colorful flower beds, and terracotta pots arranged along a stone path. Tall shrubs line the garden fence in the background creating dappled shade. Jerry, the brown mouse, emerges from the kitchen door onto the garden path, still clutching his piece of cheese as he walks hurriedly along the stone path. Tom, the blue-gray cat, follows behind Jerry with an angry expression, his paws stepping deliberately on the stone path as he narrows the distance between them. The camera pulls back to show both characters moving through the garden, with Tom gaining ground on Jerry with each step.
text_5: A sunlit garden with lush green grass, colorful flower beds, and terracotta pots arranged along a stone path. Tall shrubs line the garden fence in the background creating dappled shade. Tom, the blue-gray cat, walks forward with his focus entirely on Jerry, not noticing a large terracotta flower pot directly in his path. Jerry, the brown mouse, turns his head to look back at Tom while still holding his cheese chunk securely in his paws. Tom's foot catches on the edge of the flower pot, causing him to lose his balance and topple forward, his expression changing from anger to surprise as he falls face-first into a brown mud puddle beside the path with a visible splash.

text_0: A sunlit kitchen with white cabinets, tiled countertops, and a round wooden table. A yellow refrigerator stands in the corner, and sunlight streams through a small window. Tom, the blue-gray cat, is curled up in a wooden chair beside the table, his eyes closed and his head resting on his paws. A plate with a large chocolate chip cookie sits on the table near Tom's chair. Jerry, the brown mouse, peeks out from behind a salt shaker on the table, his eyes fixed on the cookie as he slowly emerges from his hiding spot.
text_1: A sunlit kitchen with white cabinets, tiled countertops, and a round wooden table. A yellow refrigerator stands in the corner, and sunlight streams through a small window. Tom, the blue-gray cat, remains asleep in the wooden chair, his chest rising and falling with each breath. Jerry, the brown mouse, now stands beside the cookie on the plate, placing his small paws on the edge of the treat that's nearly twice his size. The camera zooms in slightly as Jerry carefully lifts the cookie from the plate, leaving behind a trail of crumbs that fall onto the white plate surface.
text_2: A sunlit kitchen with white cabinets, tiled countertops, and a round wooden table. A yellow refrigerator stands in the corner, and sunlight streams through a small window. Tom, the blue-gray cat, twitches his whiskers in his sleep but doesn't wake, his tail curling slightly at the tip. Jerry, the brown mouse, stands at the edge of the table with the oversized cookie balanced on his shoulders, his small legs wobbling slightly under the weight. The camera follows as Jerry slowly makes his way toward the edge of the table, glancing back once at the sleeping Tom before beginning his careful descent along the table leg.
text_3: A sunlit kitchen with white cabinets, tiled countertops, and a round wooden table. A yellow refrigerator stands in the corner, and sunlight streams through a small window. Tom, the blue-gray cat, begins to stir in his chair, one eye opening slightly as he notices the trail of cookie crumbs on the plate. Jerry, the brown mouse, is now on the floor, the large cookie held above his head as he walks with careful, measured steps toward a small mouse hole in the baseboard. The camera pans down to follow Jerry's progress across the kitchen floor as he leaves a subtle trail of crumbs behind him.
text_4: Inside Jerry's mouse hole with warm amber walls, miniature furniture made from spools and matchboxes, and a cozy bed in the corner. A small round table sits in the center of the room beneath a light made from a thimble. Jerry, the brown mouse, stands proudly in the center of his home, holding the large chocolate chip cookie upright like a trophy, his chest puffed out and a wide smile on his face. The camera pulls back slightly to reveal the full mouse hole interior as Jerry places the cookie against the wall and steps back to admire his prize.
text_5: Inside Jerry's mouse hole with warm amber walls, miniature furniture made from spools and matchboxes, and a cozy bed in the corner. A small round table sits in the center of the room beneath a light made from a thimble. Jerry, the brown mouse, stands beside the cookie with his paws on his hips, looking satisfied, when suddenly a blue-gray paw reaches through the mouse hole entrance from outside. The camera zooms out as Tom's paw closes around both Jerry and the cookie, pulling them slowly but firmly toward the entrance of the mouse hole.

text_0: A wooden bedroom dresser stands against a light yellow wall, with several drawers partially opened. A glass bottle of pepper sits atop the dresser beside a small table lamp with a plain white shade. Tom, the blue-gray cat, is standing on his hind legs near the dresser, with his front paws resting on the edge of an open drawer. Tom's eyes are fixed on something inside the drawer, and his mouth forms a subtle, mischievous grin as he leans forward slightly.
text_1: A wooden bedroom dresser stands against a light yellow wall, with several drawers partially opened. A glass bottle of pepper sits atop the dresser beside a small table lamp with a plain white shade. Tom, the blue-gray cat, is positioned with his front paws on the edge of the open drawer, peering inside with widened eyes. Inside the drawer, Jerry, the brown mouse, is curled up asleep on a folded sock, his tiny body rising and falling with each breath. Tom slowly extends his paw toward the sleeping mouse, moving with deliberate caution as his whiskers twitch in anticipation.
text_2: A wooden bedroom dresser stands against a light yellow wall, with several drawers partially opened. A glass bottle of pepper sits atop the dresser beside a small table lamp with a plain white shade. Tom, the blue-gray cat, has his paw extended halfway into the drawer where Jerry, the brown mouse, continues sleeping peacefully on the folded sock. Tom's elbow accidentally bumps against the glass pepper bottle, causing it to wobble precariously on the edge of the dresser. The camera zooms in slightly as the pepper bottle tips over and begins to fall toward the open drawer.
text_3: A wooden bedroom dresser stands against a light yellow wall, with several drawers partially opened. A glass bottle of pepper sits atop the dresser beside a small table lamp with a plain white shade. Tom, the blue-gray cat, is standing with his paw still extended into the drawer where Jerry, the brown mouse, remains asleep on the folded sock, unaware of Tom's presence. The overturned pepper bottle has spilled some of its contents near Tom's face, causing his nose to wrinkle and his eyes to widen. Tom's expression changes from mischievous to alarmed as his nostrils flare and his cheeks puff slightly.
text_4: A wooden bedroom dresser stands against a light yellow wall, with several drawers partially opened. A glass bottle of pepper sits atop the dresser beside a small table lamp with a plain white shade. Tom, the blue-gray cat, is standing with his face contorted, eyes squeezed shut, and nose scrunched up as he inhales deeply. Jerry, the brown mouse, continues sleeping peacefully in the drawer, curled up on the folded sock. Tom's head tilts backward as his chest expands, his cheeks puffing outward while his whiskers splay outward in anticipation of the imminent sneeze.
text_5: A beige wall with a small framed picture shows visible cracks forming upon impact. Tom, the blue-gray cat, is pressed against the wall, his body flattened with limbs sprawled outward in a star shape, fur disheveled. His expression is dazed with swirling eyes and his tongue hanging out, while dust particles hover around him from the impact. The camera pans out to show the distance between Tom and the dresser, where Jerry, the brown mouse, continues sleeping peacefully in the open drawer, completely undisturbed by the commotion.

text_0: A cozy living room with a warm-colored sofa against a beige wall, a wooden coffee table in front, and soft carpet on the floor. The room is illuminated by natural light coming through partially drawn curtains. Tom, the blue-gray cat, is curled up on a large red cushion placed on the sofa, his eyes closed and his body rising and falling with each breath as he naps peacefully. Jerry, the brown mouse, carefully approaches the edge of the sofa from the floor, holding a small round plate with a wedge of yellow cheese. Jerry slowly lifts the edge of the cushion that Tom is sleeping on, being cautious not to disturb the cat, and gently slides the plate with cheese underneath it.
text_1: A cozy living room with a warm-colored sofa against a beige wall, a wooden coffee table in front, and soft carpet on the floor. The room is illuminated by natural light coming through partially drawn curtains. Tom, the blue-gray cat, continues to sleep soundly on the red cushion, his whiskers twitching slightly as he dreams. Jerry, the brown mouse, having placed the cheese under the cushion, carefully backs away from the sofa, glancing over his shoulder to ensure Tom hasn't awakened. The mouse moves with deliberate slowness toward the edge of the frame, a mischievous smile forming on his face as he looks back at the unsuspecting cat.
text_2: A bright kitchen with white tiled floors, wooden cabinets along the walls, and a round wooden dining table in the center. A bowl of milk sits prominently in the middle of the table, surrounded by various dinner items and utensils. Tom, the blue-gray cat, walks into the kitchen holding his red cushion from the living room, approaching the wooden dining table with a hungry expression. Jerry, the brown mouse, peeks around the doorframe into the kitchen, observing Tom with anticipation, his small paws gripping the edge of the doorway. The camera remains steady as Tom places his cushion onto one of the dining chairs, adjusting it slightly before preparing to sit down for his meal.
text_3: A bright kitchen with white tiled floors, wooden cabinets along the walls, and a round wooden dining table in the center. A bowl of milk sits prominently in the middle of the table, surrounded by various dinner items and utensils. Tom, the blue-gray cat, lowers himself onto the cushion-covered chair at the dining table, his tail swinging gently behind him as he settles into his seat. Jerry, the brown mouse, continues watching from the doorway, his eyes widening with anticipation as Tom positions himself directly above the hidden cheese plate. As Tom's weight presses down on the cushion, his expression shifts from contentment to surprise, his body gradually beginning to rise as the cushion compresses beneath him.
text_4: A bright kitchen with white tiled floors, wooden cabinets along the walls, and a round wooden dining table in the center. A bowl of milk sits prominently in the middle of the table, surrounded by various dinner items and utensils. Tom, the blue-gray cat, is now elevated above his chair as the flattening cheese plate under his cushion creates an unstable mound, causing him to wobble precariously above the table. Jerry, the brown mouse, covers his mouth with both paws to suppress his laughter as he watches from the doorway. Tom's eyes grow wide with confusion as he loses his balance, his arms flailing outward while his body tilts forward toward the bowl of milk on the table.
text_5: A close-up view of the kitchen table with the white bowl of milk centered in the frame, surrounded by scattered silverware and napkins. The wooden surface of the table is visible with some spilled milk droplets around the bowl's edges. Tom, the blue-gray cat, has his face fully submerged in the bowl of milk, his ears flattened against his head and his paws gripping the edge of the table. Milk splashes upward around Tom's face as he makes contact with the liquid, creating small white droplets that hang momentarily in the air. The camera remains fixed on this scene as milk continues to ripple outward from the impact point, while Jerry, the brown mouse, can be seen in the background doubling over with silent laughter.

text_0: A kitchen with white walls, wooden cabinets, and a tiled floor stretches across the frame. The camera focuses on a partially open cabinet near the floor with light streaming through the crack. Tom, the blue-gray cat, is crouched on all fours in front of the cabinet, his eyes wide with curiosity. He slowly reaches forward with one paw and gently pulls the cabinet door open wider, revealing a small pile of yellow cheese chunks inside.
text_1: A kitchen with white walls, wooden cabinets, and a tiled floor stretches across the frame. The camera focuses on a partially open cabinet near the floor with light streaming through the crack. Tom, the blue-gray cat, sits in front of the open cabinet, his tail swishing behind him as he stares at the cheese pile with a gleeful expression. Tom carefully reaches into the cabinet, takes a handful of cheese, and brings it toward his open mouth, his whiskers twitching in anticipation.
text_2: A kitchen with white walls, wooden cabinets, and a tiled floor stretches across the frame. The camera focuses on a partially open cabinet near the floor with light streaming through the crack. Tom, the blue-gray cat, sits with his back to the cabinet, his cheeks bulging with cheese as he chews with satisfaction. Tom's expression gradually shifts from pleasure to concern as he swallows the cheese, his paw moving to touch his throat while his eyes widen slightly.
text_3: A spacious living room with a beige couch, brown coffee table, and pastel wallpaper comes into view. A floor lamp casts soft light across the space, and a window with curtains is visible on the far wall. Tom, the blue-gray cat, stands in the center of the room, his paws at his sides and his posture increasingly rigid. His face begins to swell visibly, starting from his cheeks and spreading to his entire face, while his eyes grow wide with alarm.
text_4: A spacious living room with a beige couch, brown coffee table, and pastel wallpaper comes into view. A floor lamp casts soft light across the space, and a window with curtains is visible on the far wall. Tom, the blue-gray cat, stands with his now dramatically swollen face, his eyes barely visible as his cheeks and head have ballooned to twice their normal size. Jerry, the brown mouse, sits atop a cushion on the couch, watching Tom with a mischievous expression while holding a small white sign with both paws.
text_5: A spacious living room with a beige couch, brown coffee table, and pastel wallpaper comes into view. A floor lamp casts soft light across the space, and a window with curtains is visible on the far wall. Tom, the blue-gray cat, touches his swollen face with his paws, his expression a mixture of discomfort and confusion as he turns his head toward the couch. Jerry, the brown mouse, proudly displays his sign that reads 'Allergic to Cheese!' while smirking and pointing at Tom with one paw, the cushion beneath him sinking slightly as he shifts his weight.

text_0: A bedroom with light blue walls, a simple wooden bed with rumpled sheets, and a partially open wooden door. Jerry, the brown mouse, is carefully positioning a large black bowling ball on top of the partially open bedroom door. Jerry uses both paws to steady the bowling ball as he delicately balances it on the door's edge, his small body stretching to reach the top of the door.
text_1: A hallway with beige walls and a wooden floor stretches from the bedroom doorway to a staircase visible in the background. Jerry, the brown mouse, scurries away from the bedroom door, looking back once with a mischievous expression. Jerry moves with careful steps along the hallway wall, his small paws making deliberate movements as he heads toward the stairs leading down to the kitchen.
text_2: A kitchen with yellow walls, white cabinets, and a round wooden table in the center with a large cheese platter on it. Jerry, the brown mouse, is standing on the kitchen table next to the cheese platter filled with various types of cheese. Jerry picks up a small piece of yellow cheese and takes a bite, chewing slowly with his eyes closed in delight as he savors the flavor.
text_3: A kitchen with yellow walls, white cabinets, and a round wooden table in the center with a large cheese platter on it. Tom, the blue-gray cat, is shown waking up in the bedroom, stretching his arms above his head with half-closed eyes. Tom walks to his bedroom door and puts his paw on the doorknob, turning it slowly as he begins to pull the door open toward himself.
text_4: The wooden staircase leading down to the kitchen, with beige walls on either side and the kitchen doorway visible at the bottom. Tom, the blue-gray cat, tumbles head over heels down the stairs, the black bowling ball following closely behind him. Tom's body contorts as he rolls down each step, his eyes wide with surprise, paws flailing in the air as the bowling ball bounces after him.
text_5: A kitchen with yellow walls, white cabinets, and a round wooden table in the center with a large cheese platter on it. Tom, the blue-gray cat, flies through the air toward the kitchen table with the cheese platter. Tom lands face-first into the cheese platter, sending pieces of cheese flying in all directions while Jerry, the brown mouse, watches from the edge of the table with his paws covering his mouth to stifle his laughter.

text_0: A cozy kitchen with white tiled floor, wooden cabinets, and a small refrigerator in the corner. A small wooden table sits at the center with a plate of food and a wedge of yellow cheese. Tom, the blue-gray cat, is curled up in a wicker basket beside the refrigerator, sleeping with his eyes closed and his head resting on his paws. Jerry, the brown mouse, emerges from his mouse hole in the baseboard, his eyes fixed on the cheese wedge on the plate. Jerry tip-toes toward the table, glancing occasionally at Tom to ensure he remains asleep.
text_1: A cozy kitchen with white tiled floor, wooden cabinets, and a small refrigerator in the corner. A small wooden table sits at the center with a plate of food and a wedge of yellow cheese. Tom, the blue-gray cat, continues sleeping in the wicker basket, his chest rising and falling with each breath. Jerry, the brown mouse, stands next to the table, reaching up with both paws to grasp the edge of the cheese wedge. Jerry carefully lifts the cheese from the plate, holding it above his head with a triumphant smile forming on his face.
text_2: A cozy kitchen with white tiled floor, wooden cabinets, and a small refrigerator in the corner. A small wooden table sits at the center with an empty plate where cheese once was. Jerry, the brown mouse, holds the large yellow cheese wedge over his head as he tip-toes across the kitchen floor toward his mouse hole. Tom, the blue-gray cat, opens one eye slightly, watching Jerry while pretending to remain asleep. The camera follows Jerry as he moves deliberately across the tiled floor, the cheese wedge nearly twice his size.
text_3: A small, cozy mouse hole with rounded walls, furnished with miniature furniture including a matchbox bed and a thimble chair. A tiny table made from a spool of thread sits in the center. Jerry, the brown mouse, sits at the tiny table with the large yellow cheese wedge placed in front of him. Jerry rubs his paws together with a gleeful expression, then picks up a small knife and fork fashioned from toothpicks. The camera zooms in slowly as Jerry cuts a small piece of cheese and brings it toward his mouth.
text_4: A small, cozy mouse hole with rounded walls, furnished with miniature furniture including a matchbox bed and a thimble chair. A tiny table made from a spool of thread sits in the center. Outside the mouse hole entrance, Tom's blue-gray paw appears, carefully placing a yellow-painted sponge exactly where the cheese wedge had been while removing the real cheese. Jerry, the brown mouse, unaware of the switch, continues sitting at the table with his back to the entrance. Jerry closes his eyes in anticipation as he brings what is now the painted sponge toward his open mouth.
text_5: The wall of the kitchen with a small mouse hole in the baseboard. A peephole has been cut just above the mouse hole, through which Tom's large eye is visible, peering inside. Inside the mouse hole, Jerry, the brown mouse, bites down hard on the yellow-painted sponge with a confident expression. Jerry's eyes suddenly widen in surprise as his teeth sink into the sponge and then comically spring back like coils. Tom's eye crinkles at the corner as he watches through the peephole, clearly enjoying Jerry's predicament.

text_0: A cozy living room with beige walls, a green sofa against the wall, a wooden coffee table in the center, and a tan carpet covering the floor. Tom, the blue-gray cat, is holding a large cushion with a cheese pattern, standing near the coffee table with a sly expression on his face. Tom places the cushion carefully on the green sofa, looking over his shoulder to ensure no one is watching, then takes a step back to admire his handiwork.
text_1: A cozy living room with beige walls, a green sofa against the wall, a wooden coffee table in the center, and a tan carpet covering the floor. Tom, the blue-gray cat, is standing beside the green sofa, his whiskers twitching with anticipation as he eyes the cheese-patterned cushion he just placed. Tom rubs his paws together with a devious grin, then slowly backs away toward the doorway leading to the kitchen, keeping his eyes fixed on the cushion.
text_2: A cozy living room with beige walls, a green sofa against the wall, a wooden coffee table in the center, and a tan carpet covering the floor. Jerry, the brown mouse, emerges from a small mouse hole in the baseboard, his nose twitching as he sniffs the air. Jerry walks across the tan carpet, following the scent trail toward the green sofa, his eyes widening with delight as he spots the cheese-patterned cushion.
text_3: A kitchen with white cabinets, a gray counter along the wall, a white refrigerator in the corner, and black and white checkered floor tiles. Tom, the blue-gray cat, is leaning against the kitchen counter with his arms crossed, a smug smile spread across his face. Tom taps his foot rhythmically on the checkered floor, occasionally glancing toward the living room doorway with an expression of satisfied anticipation.
text_4: A kitchen with white cabinets, a gray counter along the wall, a white refrigerator in the corner, and black and white checkered floor tiles. Tom, the blue-gray cat, is standing in the middle of the kitchen, still wearing his confident smile as he gazes at the doorway. Jerry, the brown mouse, enters the kitchen doorway, struggling to push the entire cheese-patterned cushion that is several times his size, determination showing on his small face.
text_5: A kitchen with white cabinets, a gray counter along the wall, a white refrigerator in the corner, and black and white checkered floor tiles. Tom, the blue-gray cat, is standing with his mouth open in shock as Jerry, the brown mouse, lifts the cheese-patterned cushion over Tom's head. The cushion bursts open as it lands on Tom's head, covering him in white fluffy stuffing while Jerry stands nearby with a triumphant smile.

text_0: A bright, clean kitchen with white tiled walls, wooden cabinets, and a tiled floor. A small refrigerator stands in the corner next to a counter with a bowl on it. Jerry, the brown mouse, peeks from behind a sugar jar on the kitchen counter, watching Tom, the blue-gray cat, who is sleeping curled up next to his food and milk bowl on the floor. Jerry tiptoes quietly across the counter toward a jug of white paint sitting near the edge, occasionally glancing at Tom to ensure he remains asleep.
text_1: A bright, clean kitchen with white tiled walls, wooden cabinets, and a tiled floor. A small refrigerator stands in the corner next to a counter with a bowl on it. Jerry, the brown mouse, stands beside Tom's milk bowl on the kitchen floor, holding a small jug of white paint. Tom, the blue-gray cat, approaches from the left side of the frame, looking hungry and unaware of Jerry's presence. Jerry carefully pours the white paint into Tom's empty milk bowl, filling it completely, then quickly ducks behind the refrigerator while Tom walks toward his bowl.
text_2: A bright, clean kitchen with white tiled walls, wooden cabinets, and a tiled floor. A small refrigerator stands in the corner next to a counter with a bowl on it. Tom, the blue-gray cat, sits in front of his food bowl on the kitchen floor, bending down with his tongue extended toward the white liquid in his bowl. Jerry, the brown mouse, peeks out from behind the refrigerator with a mischievous smile, his hands covering his mouth to suppress his laughter. Tom begins lapping up the white paint from his bowl, his tongue making contact with the liquid as Jerry watches with anticipation.
text_3: A cozy living room with a beige couch against a light blue wall, a small coffee table in the center, and a framed picture hanging on the wall. A potted plant sits in the corner near a window with yellow curtains. Tom, the blue-gray cat, stands in the middle of the living room with his mouth completely covered in white paint, his lips frozen in a grimace, and his eyes wide with shock. Jerry, the brown mouse, stands a few feet away from Tom, pointing at the cat's white-painted face with one hand while holding his stomach with the other.
text_4: A cozy living room with a beige couch against a light blue wall, a small coffee table in the center, and a framed picture hanging on the wall. A potted plant sits in the corner near a window with yellow curtains. Tom, the blue-gray cat, stands motionless in the center of the room, his face frozen in a white paint grimace, his whiskers sticking out stiffly, and his eyes crossed with displeasure. Jerry, the brown mouse, falls backward onto the floor, kicking his tiny legs in the air as he laughs uncontrollably at Tom's predicament. The camera slowly zooms in on Tom's painted face as Jerry continues to laugh heartily on the floor.
text_5: A cozy living room with a beige couch against a light blue wall, a small coffee table in the center, and a framed picture hanging on the wall. A potted plant sits in the corner near a window with yellow curtains. Tom, the blue-gray cat, slowly turns his head toward Jerry, his face still covered in white paint, his eyes narrowing into an angry glare. Jerry, the brown mouse, lies on his back on the floor, wiping tears of laughter from his eyes, unaware that Tom is now looking at him with growing anger. Tom's tail begins to twitch back and forth as he takes one slow, deliberate step toward the still-laughing Jerry.

text_0: A cozy living room with a plush pillow on the carpeted floor. The walls are painted in a warm beige tone, and soft natural light filters through a nearby window. Tom, the blue-gray cat, stands at the entrance to the living room, his eyes fixed on something in the distance. He spots Jerry, the brown mouse, who is curled up asleep on the plush pillow in the center of the room, breathing softly with his eyes closed. Tom's expression shifts to one of cunning as he carefully lifts his right paw and begins to tiptoe toward the sleeping mouse, moving slowly and deliberately across the carpeted floor.
text_1: A cozy living room with a plush pillow on the carpeted floor. The walls are painted in a warm beige tone, and soft natural light filters through a nearby window. Tom, the blue-gray cat, is now halfway across the room, holding a clear glass jar in his right paw while his left paw is raised in a cautious gesture. His body is hunched slightly forward as he continues to tiptoe deliberately toward Jerry, the brown mouse, who remains asleep on the plush pillow, unaware of the approaching cat. Tom moves slowly toward the pillow, lowering the glass jar in front of him as he prepares to capture the sleeping mouse.
text_2: A close-up view of the plush pillow on the carpeted floor, with soft beige walls visible in the background. The pillow takes up most of the lower portion of the frame, while the upper portion shows part of the living room. Tom, the blue-gray cat, is now directly above the pillow, his body bent forward with the glass jar held firmly in both paws, positioned just inches away from Jerry. Jerry, the brown mouse, is lying on the pillow but his eyes suddenly snap open wide with surprise as he becomes aware of Tom's presence. Jerry quickly rolls to the side of the pillow as Tom brings the jar down, moving with just enough speed to avoid being trapped.
text_3: A cozy living room with a plush pillow on the carpeted floor. The walls are painted in a warm beige tone, and soft natural light filters through a nearby window. Tom, the blue-gray cat, is bent forward with his head completely inside the glass jar that has missed Jerry and instead landed firmly on the cat's head. His paws are raised on either side of the jar, touching its surface as he realizes his predicament. Jerry, the brown mouse, is now sitting upright at the edge of the pillow, watching Tom with his paws crossed over his chest. Tom straightens up slowly, his vision obscured by the glass jar as he tries unsuccessfully to pull it off his head.
text_4: A wider view of the living room showing more of the beige walls and carpeted floor. A coffee table is now visible to the right of the frame, and the pillow remains on the floor to the left. Tom, the blue-gray cat, stands in the center of the room with the glass jar still firmly stuck on his head, his paws feeling the air around him as he takes a tentative step forward. Jerry, the brown mouse, has moved from the pillow and now stands a few feet away from Tom, his expression showing amusement as he watches the cat's predicament. Tom turns slightly to the left and then to the right, clearly disoriented as he stumbles forward with his arms outstretched, attempting to navigate the room without being able to see.
text_5: A close-up view of Tom's upper body and the glass jar stuck on his head. The background shows a blurred portion of the beige living room wall. Tom, the blue-gray cat, has both paws on the sides of the glass jar, pulling desperately in an attempt to free his head. His ears are flattened against his head inside the jar, and his expression of panic is visible through the glass. Jerry, the brown mouse, is perched on a nearby shelf that is visible at the edge of the frame, holding his stomach as he watches Tom's struggle. Tom continues pulling at the jar with increasing frustration, his shoulders hunching with effort while Jerry observes the scene with undisguised glee.

text_0: A spacious kitchen with white tiled floors, light yellow walls, and wooden cabinets. A simple wooden table sits in the center of the room with a few chairs around it. Tom, the blue-gray cat, lies curled up on the floor near his food and water bowls, fast asleep with his eyes closed and his chest rising and falling slowly. Jerry, the brown mouse, cautiously approaches Tom's white ceramic milk bowl, which is filled to the brim with white milk. Jerry stands on his hind legs and begins nibbling a small hole near the bottom edge of the ceramic bowl, his tiny paws steadying himself against the bowl's surface.
text_1: A spacious kitchen with white tiled floors, light yellow walls, and wooden cabinets. A simple wooden table sits in the center of the room with a few chairs around it. Tom, the blue-gray cat, continues to sleep peacefully on the floor, his tail occasionally twitching as he dreams. Jerry, the brown mouse, has successfully created a small hole in Tom's milk bowl, and white milk now slowly drips from the hole, forming a small puddle on the tiled floor. The camera slowly zooms in on the growing milk puddle beside the still-sleeping Tom, highlighting the contrast between the expanding white liquid and the clean floor.
text_2: A spacious kitchen with white tiled floors, light yellow walls, and wooden cabinets. A simple wooden table sits in the center of the room with a few chairs around it. Tom, the blue-gray cat, slowly opens his eyes and stretches his front paws forward, yawning widely as he gradually wakes from his nap. Jerry, the brown mouse, notices Tom awakening and quickly scurries away from the leaking milk bowl, disappearing behind one of the kitchen cabinets. The camera pans back as Tom stands up on all fours, unaware of the milk puddle directly beneath him, and takes a step forward with his right front paw landing directly in the slippery white liquid.
text_3: A spacious kitchen with white tiled floors, light yellow walls, and wooden cabinets. A simple wooden table sits in the center of the room with a few chairs around it. Tom, the blue-gray cat, has both front paws now in the milk puddle, his eyes widening in surprise as he feels his balance giving way. Jerry, the brown mouse, peeks out from behind a cabinet drawer, watching with amusement as Tom's predicament unfolds. The camera follows as Tom struggles to maintain his balance, his legs splaying outward on the slippery surface while his body slides toward the open doorway that leads into the adjacent living room.
text_4: A cozy living room with a wooden floor, beige walls, and a large window with drawn curtains. A plush sofa sits against one wall while a tall wooden bookshelf filled with colorful books stands against the opposite wall. Tom, the blue-gray cat, slides into the room from the kitchen doorway, his four paws splayed outward as he glides uncontrollably across the wooden floor. Jerry, the brown mouse, watches from the kitchen doorway, his paws covering his mouth to suppress his laughter. The camera pans along with Tom as he slides directly toward the tall bookshelf, his eyes growing wider with each passing second as he realizes his inevitable collision.
text_5: A cozy living room with a wooden floor, beige walls, and a large window with drawn curtains. A plush sofa sits against one wall while a tall wooden bookshelf filled with colorful books stands against the opposite wall. Tom, the blue-gray cat, collides with the bookshelf with a moderate impact, causing the structure to shake and several books to become dislodged from the upper shelves. Jerry, the brown mouse, observes from a safe distance with an amused expression on his face. The camera holds steady as the books tumble down one by one, landing on Tom's head and surrounding him on the floor, while Tom sits dazed with a confused expression, his ears flattened against his head.

text_0: A spacious kitchen with cream-colored walls. A wooden table stands at the center with chairs tucked beneath it, and sunlight streams through a curtained window. Tom, the blue-gray cat, sits at the kitchen table, his attention focused on a large sandwich placed on a white plate in front of him. Jerry, the brown mouse, peeks out from behind a salt shaker, eyeing the sandwich with hungry intent. The camera captures Jerry slowly inching toward the sandwich while Tom momentarily looks away at something off-screen.
text_1: A spacious kitchen with cream-colored walls. A wooden table stands at the center with chairs tucked beneath it, and sunlight streams through a curtained window. Tom, the blue-gray cat, has his head turned away from the table where his sandwich sits on a white plate. Jerry, the brown mouse, stands beside the sandwich, which is now twice his size, as he places his tiny paws on the bread. Jerry carefully lifts one corner of the sandwich and begins to drag it slowly across the table surface toward the edge.
text_2: A spacious kitchen with cream-colored walls. A wooden table stands at the center with chairs tucked beneath it, and sunlight streams through a curtained window. Tom, the blue-gray cat, turns his head back toward his plate, his eyes widening as he sees Jerry, the brown mouse, pulling his sandwich toward the edge of the table. Jerry looks over his shoulder at Tom while continuing to drag the oversized sandwich, now halfway off the plate and moving toward the table edge.
text_3: The kitchen floor is visible with a white baseboard running along a cream-colored wall. A small mouse hole with chewed edges is visible in the baseboard. Tom, the blue-gray cat, lunges forward with his paws outstretched toward Jerry, the brown mouse, who is scurrying across the floor with the sandwich balanced on his back. Jerry moves steadily toward the mouse hole while Tom's body extends horizontally through the air, his claws just missing Jerry's tail.
text_4: The kitchen floor is visible with a white baseboard running along a cream-colored wall. A small mouse hole with chewed edges is visible in the baseboard. Tom, the blue-gray cat, is face-first against the wall, his body crumpled against the baseboard with stars circling above his head. Jerry, the brown mouse, stands at the entrance of his mouse hole, the sandwich now partially pulled inside as he looks back at Tom with a victorious smile.
text_5: Inside a cozy mouse hole with earthen walls lined with miniature furniture. A tiny table and chair sit in the center on a woven rug with a matchbox bed visible in the corner. Jerry, the brown mouse, sits comfortably in a small chair at his table, contentedly munching on the sandwich that's now cut into smaller portions on a bottlecap plate. Through the round entrance of the mouse hole, Tom, the blue-gray cat, can be seen sitting outside with a large bump on his head, rubbing the injury with his paw while glaring at the mouse hole.

text_0: The kitchen has white tiled walls, a polished linoleum floor, and wooden cabinets along the far wall. A refrigerator stands in the corner next to a small window with yellow curtains. Tom, the blue-gray cat, is holding a large cushion with both paws while looking around cautiously. A wedge of yellow cheese is in his back pocket, partially visible. Tom walks slowly across the kitchen floor, gently places the cushion in the center of the room, and stands back to examine its position.
text_1: The kitchen has white tiled walls, a polished linoleum floor, and wooden cabinets along the far wall. A refrigerator stands in the corner next to a small window with yellow curtains. Tom, the blue-gray cat, is standing beside the cushion that now lies flat on the kitchen floor. He holds a triangular wedge of yellow cheese in his right paw. Tom bends forward at the waist, carefully places the cheese on top of the cushion, and then takes a few steps back, nodding with satisfaction.
text_2: The living room features a beige sofa against a light blue wall, with a coffee table in the center and a lamp in the corner. A doorway leading to the kitchen is visible on the right side. Spike, the gray dog, is sleeping soundly on the sofa, his large body stretched out with his paws dangling over the edge. Jerry, the brown mouse, peeks out from behind the coffee table leg, observing the scene. Jerry cautiously emerges from his hiding spot and moves toward the doorway leading to the kitchen, his eyes fixed on something in the other room.
text_3: The living room features a beige sofa against a light blue wall, with a coffee table in the center and a lamp in the corner. A doorway leading to the kitchen is visible on the right side. Jerry, the brown mouse, is standing in the doorway holding the end of a thin string that extends into the kitchen. Spike, the gray dog, continues to sleep peacefully on the sofa, occasionally twitching his ear. Jerry gently pulls on the string, creating tension, while glancing back and forth between the kitchen and the sleeping Spike.
text_4: The kitchen has white tiled walls, a polished linoleum floor, and wooden cabinets along the far wall. A refrigerator stands in the corner next to a small window with yellow curtains. The cheese is now visibly moving across the cushion, attached to the string being pulled from the living room. Tom, the blue-gray cat, is crouched behind the refrigerator, watching intently with wide eyes. The cheese slides off the cushion, causing the cushion to suddenly spring upward like a catapult, launching high into the air toward the living room doorway.
text_5: The living room features a beige sofa against a light blue wall, with a coffee table in the center and a lamp in the corner. The sofa is now empty, with an indentation where Spike had been sleeping. Spike, the gray dog, is suspended in mid-air, having been catapulted from the kitchen. Tom, the blue-gray cat, is crushed beneath Spike's large body on the living room floor, with only his head and tail visible. Jerry, the brown mouse, stands nearby holding the cheese and string, covering his mouth with his free paw as he watches the scene unfold.

text_0: A bright, spacious kitchen with white tile flooring and yellow walls. A wooden table sits in the center with a small, white bowl of milk placed near the edge. Jerry, the brown mouse, approaches the bowl of milk cautiously, looking around to ensure Tom isn't nearby. His tiny paws reach for the edge of the bowl as he prepares to move it. Jerry slowly lifts the bowl of milk, which is nearly his size, and begins to walk backward toward the wall with the mouse hole.
text_1: A bright, spacious kitchen with white tile flooring and yellow walls. A wooden table sits in the center where the bowl of milk previously was. Jerry, the brown mouse, is now on the floor holding the white bowl of milk above his head with both paws. The milk sloshes gently inside the bowl as Jerry walks deliberately across the kitchen floor. Jerry moves steadily across the tile floor toward his mouse hole, his face showing determination as he balances the bowl carefully above his head.
text_2: A bright, spacious kitchen with white tile flooring and yellow walls. A small black marble is visible on the floor near the mouse hole in the baseboard. Jerry, the brown mouse, is walking toward his mouse hole, still carrying the white bowl of milk above his head with both paws. Jerry steps forward confidently but his foot makes contact with the marble, causing him to lose his balance. The bowl tilts in his paws as he begins to stumble, and milk starts to spill over the edge.
text_3: A bright, spacious kitchen with white tile flooring and yellow walls. A mouse hole is visible in the baseboard, with a small black marble nearby. Jerry, the brown mouse, is falling backward with his arms outstretched, no longer holding the bowl. The white bowl of milk is airborne, completely tipped over and sending a stream of white liquid toward the mouse hole. The milk pours through the air in a perfect arc toward the mouse hole entrance as Jerry watches from his fallen position on the floor.
text_4: A bright, spacious kitchen with white tile flooring and yellow walls. A mouse hole is visible in the baseboard with milk splatter around its entrance. Jerry, the brown mouse, is sitting on the floor near his mouse hole, looking confused and disappointed. The empty bowl lies on its side next to him on the kitchen floor. Jerry slowly stands up and walks toward his mouse hole, peering inside with a worried expression as milk drips from the entrance.
text_5: Inside Jerry's mouse hole, there is a cozy miniature bedroom with tiny furniture, including a matchbox bed with a red fabric blanket. The walls are made of earth and small decorative items hang on them. Jerry, the brown mouse, stands in the doorway of his bedroom, his mouth agape in shock. The matchbox bed is completely soaked, with milk pooling on and around it, dripping onto the floor. Jerry walks toward his bed with his paws on his head in dismay, looking at the milk-soaked blanket and pillow.

text_0: A spacious kitchen with white walls, a tiled floor, and wooden cabinets. A small bowl sits on the floor near the refrigerator, and a piece of yellow cheese rests on the kitchen counter. Tom, the blue-gray cat, sleeps peacefully in his round food bowl on the floor, his body curled up with his tail hanging over the edge. Jerry, the brown mouse, approaches the kitchen counter where a large wedge of yellow cheese sits, glancing cautiously at the sleeping cat before reaching for the cheese.
text_1: A spacious kitchen with white walls, a tiled floor, and wooden cabinets. A small bowl sits on the floor near the refrigerator, and a piece of yellow cheese rests on the kitchen counter. Tom, the blue-gray cat, continues to sleep in his round food bowl, his chest rising and falling with each breath. Jerry, the brown mouse, stands on the kitchen counter beside the cheese wedge, taking a small bite from the corner while holding a piece in his paws, looking content as he chews slowly.
text_2: A spacious kitchen with white walls, a tiled floor, and wooden cabinets. A small bowl sits on the floor near the refrigerator, and a piece of yellow cheese rests on the kitchen counter. Tom, the blue-gray cat, remains asleep in his round food bowl, but now a small yellow crumb has fallen onto his pink nose. Jerry, the brown mouse, stands on the edge of the counter holding his partially-eaten cheese piece, watching with wide eyes as Tom's nose twitches from the fallen crumb.
text_3: A spacious kitchen with white walls, a tiled floor, and wooden cabinets. A small bowl sits on the floor near the refrigerator, and a piece of yellow cheese rests on the kitchen counter. Tom, the blue-gray cat, wrinkles his nose as the cheese crumb tickles it, then his head tilts back as his mouth opens for a large sneeze. Jerry, the brown mouse, still holding his cheese, is blown backward by the force of Tom's sneeze, his small body floating through the air toward the kitchen doorway.
text_4: A comfortable living room with beige walls, a brown wooden floor, and a large red armchair in the center. A small coffee table sits nearby and a window with green curtains lets in some sunlight. Jerry, the brown mouse, soars through the air from the kitchen doorway, still clutching his piece of cheese, his arms and legs spread wide as he flies. The camera follows Jerry's trajectory as he arcs through the air, heading directly toward the large red armchair.
text_5: A comfortable living room with beige walls, a brown wooden floor, and a large red armchair in the center. A small coffee table sits nearby and a window with green curtains lets in some sunlight. Jerry, the brown mouse, lands softly on the plush cushion of the red armchair, bouncing slightly from the impact. He sits up, crosses his legs, and takes another bite of his cheese with a smug expression, his free paw patting the soft cushion appreciatively.

text_0: A garden patio with brick flooring, a green lawn area to the left, and a white wall in the background. A flower pot sits near the wall, casting a small shadow on the bricks. Tom, the blue-gray cat, stands on the right side of the patio, his ears perked up and eyes wide with interest. Jerry, the brown mouse, is curled up underneath the terracotta flower pot, sleeping peacefully with his eyes closed and his body rising and falling with each breath. Tom spots Jerry sleeping under the pot and slowly approaches on tiptoe, his whiskers twitching and a subtle smile forming on his face as he examines the situation.
text_1: A garden patio with brick flooring, a green lawn area to the left, and a white wall in the background. A flower pot sits near the wall, casting a small shadow on the bricks. Tom, the blue-gray cat, stands beside the flower pot with an eager expression, his tail swishing slowly behind him. Jerry, the brown mouse, continues to sleep peacefully underneath the terracotta pot, unaware of Tom's presence above him. Tom quietly walks away from the pot toward a nearby bookshelf, carefully selects a large leather-bound book, and returns to the flower pot with the book held firmly in both paws.
text_2: A wooden bookshelf stands against a cream-colored wall, filled with various books of different sizes and colors. Several potted plants sit on the top shelf, and a small table lamp illuminates the area. Tom, the blue-gray cat, stands in front of the bookshelf on his hind legs, his right paw extended toward a thick, red leather-bound book on the middle shelf. Tom's whiskers twitch with anticipation as his eyes narrow in concentration. Tom carefully pulls the heavy book from the shelf with both paws, struggling slightly with its weight, then turns and walks slowly back toward the direction of the garden patio.
text_3: A garden patio with brick flooring, a green lawn area to the left, and a white wall in the background. A flower pot sits near the wall, casting a small shadow on the bricks. Tom, the blue-gray cat, approaches the flower pot carrying a large, heavy red book in his paws, a smirk on his face and his tail swishing behind him. Jerry, the brown mouse, remains asleep under the terracotta pot, his tiny body barely visible beneath the rim. Tom gently places the book on top of the flower pot, steps back with his paws on his hips, and nods with satisfaction while looking down at his trap with a triumphant expression.
text_4: A garden patio with brick flooring, a green lawn area to the left, and a white wall in the background. A flower pot sits near the wall, casting a small shadow on the bricks. Tom, the blue-gray cat, is walking away from the flower pot with his back to it, his tail held high and a proud smile on his face. Jerry, the brown mouse, has awakened under the pot and is pushing against one side, causing the pot to tilt slightly with the heavy book beginning to slide. The pot slowly tilts further to the side as Jerry pushes with all his might, and the red book slides completely off the edge toward the direction of Tom's swishing tail.
text_5: A garden patio with brick flooring, a green lawn area to the left, and a white wall in the background. A flower pot sits near the wall, now tilted to one side with Jerry, the brown mouse, standing beside it stretching his arms and yawning. Tom, the blue-gray cat, is seated on the brick patio with the large red book squarely on his tail, his mouth wide open in a silent howl and his eyes bulging in pain. Jerry rubs his eyes sleepily, glances briefly at Tom's predicament, then walks back under the partially tilted flower pot, curls up, and closes his eyes to resume his nap while Tom remains frozen in his painful position.

text_0: A bright, sunlit kitchen with a wooden table in the center. The table has a red and white checkered tablecloth, and the walls are a pale yellow. Tom, the blue-gray cat, is sleeping on a chair next to the table, his head resting on his paws. Jerry, the brown mouse, quietly approaches the table from the opposite side, eyeing a cheese sandwich placed on a white plate. Jerry glances cautiously at the sleeping Tom, then slowly reaches for the sandwich, keeping his movements deliberate and silent.
text_1: A bright, sunlit kitchen with a wooden table in the center. The table has a red and white checkered tablecloth, and the walls are a pale yellow. Jerry, the brown mouse, stands on the wooden table next to the white plate that now has only crumbs where the cheese sandwich was. Tom, the blue-gray cat, begins to stir from his sleep, stretching his front paws forward and opening his eyes slowly. Jerry carefully gathers the last piece of the sandwich in his arms, backing away toward the edge of the table while Tom blinks sleepily, still unaware of the theft.
text_2: A cozy living room with a large beige sofa against a light blue wall. A wooden coffee table sits in front of the sofa, and a bowl of milk is placed on the floor near a small pencil. Tom, the blue-gray cat, walks into the living room with his back arched and tail raised high, looking around with narrowed eyes. His face shows growing anger as he scans the room, his whiskers twitching as he notices small crumbs trailing across the floor toward a plush cushion in the corner.
text_3: A cozy living room with a large beige sofa against a light blue wall. A wooden coffee table sits in front of the sofa, and a bowl of milk is placed on the floor near a small pencil. Jerry, the brown mouse, sits comfortably on a plush cushion in the corner of the room, holding the cheese sandwich with both hands and taking a bite. Tom, the blue-gray cat, spots Jerry and begins walking deliberately toward him, his tail swishing slowly from side to side and his eyes fixed on the mouse and the stolen sandwich.
text_4: A cozy living room with a large beige sofa against a light blue wall. A wooden coffee table sits in front of the sofa, and a bowl of milk is placed on the floor near a small pencil. Tom, the blue-gray cat, continues advancing toward Jerry, the brown mouse, who remains seated on the cushion, still enjoying the cheese sandwich. Tom steps forward with his right paw extended, not noticing the pencil on the floor directly in his path, while Jerry looks up and notices the approaching cat with widening eyes.
text_5: The living room floor with the bowl of milk now in clear focus. The beige sofa is visible in the background and scattered crumbs from the sandwich lie near the cushion. Tom, the blue-gray cat, has his face completely submerged in the bowl of milk, with his rear end and tail sticking up in the air. Jerry, the brown mouse, sits on his cushion a safe distance away, holding the remaining portion of the cheese sandwich and watching Tom with an amused expression as milk splashes around the bowl from the impact.

text_0: A spacious kitchen with cream-colored walls, white tiles, and wooden cabinets. A wooden table sits in the center with a plate holding a half-eaten sandwich. Tom, the blue-gray cat, is sleeping on a brown wooden chair near the table, his head tilted back with his mouth slightly open. Jerry, the brown mouse, peeks out from behind a salt shaker on the table, eyeing the sandwich with interest. Jerry slowly approaches the sandwich, his tiny paws moving cautiously as he maintains his focus on Tom's sleeping form, while the camera remains stationary capturing the scene.
text_1: A spacious kitchen with cream-colored walls, white tiles, and wooden cabinets. A wooden table sits in the center with a plate holding a half-eaten sandwich. Tom, the blue-gray cat, continues sleeping on the brown wooden chair, his chest rising and falling with each breath. Jerry, the brown mouse, stands beside the sandwich on the table, carefully lifting a triangular wedge of yellow cheese from between the bread slices. Jerry gently pulls the cheese free from the sandwich, holding it in both paws while glancing periodically at Tom to ensure he remains asleep, as the camera slowly zooms in on Jerry's cautious movements.
text_2: A section of the kitchen wall showing a small, round mouse hole at the bottom with cracked edges. The floor is tiled in white with small specks of dust visible. Jerry, the brown mouse, approaches the mouse hole from the left side of the frame, holding a large wedge of yellow cheese in his paws. Jerry walks toward the mouse hole with deliberate steps, his tail swishing gently behind him as he proudly carries his prize, while the camera follows his movement toward the entrance of his home.
text_3: Inside the mouse hole is a cozy bedroom with tiny furniture made of matchboxes and spools. A small bed with a cotton ball pillow sits against one wall, and a thimble serves as a nightstand. Jerry, the brown mouse, stands in the center of the room, holding the wedge of yellow cheese in his paws. Jerry lifts the cheese toward his mouth and takes a large bite, his expression shifting from satisfaction to surprise as he registers the taste, while the camera holds steady on his changing facial reaction.
text_4: Inside the mouse hole is a cozy bedroom with tiny furniture made of matchboxes and spools. A small bed with a cotton ball pillow sits against one wall, and a thimble serves as a nightstand. Jerry, the brown mouse, stands in the center of the room with the partially eaten cheese wedge in one paw, his eyes widening and cheeks bulging. Jerry's face gradually turns red from the bottom up as the hot sauce takes effect, his free paw moving to his throat while tiny wisps of steam begin to escape from his ears, as the camera slowly zooms in on his increasingly distressed expression.
text_5: Inside the mouse hole is a cozy bedroom with tiny furniture made of matchboxes and spools. A small bed with a cotton ball pillow sits against one wall, and a thimble serves as a nightstand. Jerry, the brown mouse, is now frantically fanning his open mouth with both paws, the cheese dropped on the floor beside him. Jerry's tongue hangs out of his mouth, bright red and steaming, as he desperately fans it with both paws moving in alternating motions, while the camera pulls back slightly to capture his full body reaction to the spicy sabotage.

text_0: A spacious kitchen with checkered floor tiles, white cabinets, and a wooden counter along the wall. A small window above the sink lets in morning light. Tom, the blue-gray cat, stands near the counter with a mischievous grin. He holds a small container of white paint in one paw and looks around cautiously to ensure he is alone. With slow, deliberate movements, Tom reaches for a small bowl labeled 'Jerry' on the counter while glancing toward the kitchen entrance.
text_1: A spacious kitchen with checkered floor tiles, white cabinets, and a wooden counter along the wall. A small window above the sink lets in morning light. Tom, the blue-gray cat, stands next to a small bowl on the counter. The bowl is half-filled with milk and has 'Jerry' written on its side. Tom carefully tilts the white paint container over the bowl, watching as the thick white liquid slowly pours out, replacing the milk. With his free paw, Tom stirs the paint gently to make it look like milk, his whiskers twitching in anticipation.
text_2: A spacious kitchen with checkered floor tiles, white cabinets, and a wooden counter along the wall. A small window above the sink lets in morning light. Tom, the blue-gray cat, places the empty paint container behind a cookie jar on the counter. He adjusts the milk bowl to its original position and steps back to admire his handiwork. Tom's mouth curls into a satisfied smile as he turns and slowly walks toward the kitchen doorway, occasionally looking back at the bowl with anticipation.
text_3: A cozy living room with a floral-patterned sofa against a pale yellow wall. A coffee table sits on a round rug in the center, and curtained windows allow soft light to filter through. Jerry, the brown mouse, emerges from a small mouse hole in the baseboard, stretching his arms as he walks into the room. He notices a small bowl of what appears to be milk placed on the coffee table and approaches it with a delighted expression, his nose twitching as he sniffs the air.
text_4: A cozy living room with a floral-patterned sofa against a pale yellow wall. A coffee table sits on a round rug in the center, and curtained windows allow soft light to filter through. Jerry, the brown mouse, stands beside the small bowl on the coffee table, looking at the white liquid with anticipation. He leans forward and takes a big gulp from the bowl, his cheeks puffing out as he fills his mouth. Jerry's eyes suddenly bulge wide open in surprise as he remains frozen with his mouth full, one paw still holding the edge of the bowl.
text_5: A cozy living room with a floral-patterned sofa against a pale yellow wall. A coffee table sits on a round rug in the center, and curtained windows allow soft light to filter through. Jerry, the brown mouse, stands completely still with his bulging eyes fixed in shock. His stomach begins to expand and harden, turning chalky white from the inside out. The white color spreads throughout Jerry's body until he resembles a small statue, frozen in mid-swallow position with one paw still raised. From behind the sofa, Tom's head slowly appears, his eyes narrowed in satisfaction as he observes his successful prank.

text_0: A spacious kitchen with light yellow walls, white tile flooring, and wooden countertops. A round wooden table sits in the center with a plate of chocolate chip cookies on top. Jerry, the brown mouse, stands on his hind legs at the edge of the table, eyeing the cookie plate with excitement. Jerry slowly reaches forward, carefully picks up a large chocolate chip cookie that's nearly the size of his body, and glances around cautiously before backing away with his prize.
text_1: A beige wall with a small, circular mouse hole at its base. The floor is made of polished hardwood with a small gap between the baseboard and the floor. Jerry, the brown mouse, approaches the mouse hole carrying a chocolate chip cookie that's almost as big as he is. Jerry shuffles toward the mouse hole with the cookie held over his head, then stops at the entrance, lowers the cookie, and takes a satisfied bite, with small crumbs falling to the floor.
text_2: A lush green garden with neatly trimmed grass, colorful flower beds along the edges, and a clear blue sky overhead. A large oak tree stands tall in the center with spreading branches and dense foliage. Tom, the blue-gray cat, lies curled up asleep under the oak tree, his body rising and falling with each breath, one paw tucked under his head as a pillow. The sunlight filters through the leaves, creating dappled patterns on Tom's fur as he sleeps peacefully, completely unaware of his surroundings.
text_3: A lush green garden with neatly trimmed grass, colorful flower beds along the edges, and a clear blue sky overhead. A large oak tree stands tall in the center with spreading branches and dense foliage. Tom, the blue-gray cat, continues sleeping under the oak tree, his whiskers occasionally twitching as he dreams. The camera tilts upward to reveal Jerry, the brown mouse, sitting on a branch directly above Tom, munching on his stolen cookie with his legs dangling from the branch.
text_4: A lush green garden with neatly trimmed grass, colorful flower beds along the edges, and a clear blue sky overhead. A large oak tree stands tall in the center with spreading branches and dense foliage. Jerry, the brown mouse, sits on a tree branch above Tom, deliberately holding his half-eaten cookie over the edge so crumbs fall downward. The cookie crumbs slowly descend through the air and land on Tom's face and whiskers, causing the cat's nose to twitch and his eyes to begin fluttering open.
text_5: A close-up view of Tom's face against the grass and tree trunk background, with dappled sunlight playing across his features. Several cookie crumbs are visible on his whiskers and the top of his head. Tom, the blue-gray cat, opens his eyes widely in confusion, blinks several times, and turns his gaze upward with a frown forming on his face. The camera pulls back to show Jerry, the brown mouse, sitting on the branch above with a smug smile, waving the partially eaten cookie tauntingly while more crumbs deliberately fall onto Tom's increasingly irritated face.

text_0: A brightly lit kitchen with a tiled floor and wooden cabinets. A food bowl sits on the floor near a refrigerator, and sunlight streams through a window above the sink. Jerry, the brown mouse, tiptoes across the kitchen floor carrying a small bucket of white paint. He approaches a ceramic bowl filled with milk that has 'Tom' written on the side. Jerry gently pours the white paint into Tom's bowl, replacing the milk. The camera follows Jerry's careful movements as he empties the bucket completely.
text_1: A brightly lit kitchen with a tiled floor and wooden cabinets. A food bowl sits on the floor near a refrigerator, and sunlight streams through a window above the sink. Jerry, the brown mouse, sets down the empty paint bucket next to Tom's bowl, which is now filled with white paint. He looks around cautiously, then walks over to a nearby cheese wheel on the counter. Jerry reaches out and breaks off a small chunk of yellow cheese from the wheel. The camera zooms in slightly as Jerry holds the cheese piece with both hands, a pleased expression on his face.
text_2: A brightly lit kitchen with a tiled floor and wooden cabinets. A food bowl sits on the floor near a refrigerator, and sunlight streams through a window above the sink. Jerry, the brown mouse, holds a chunk of cheese in his paws and turns toward a small mouse hole in the baseboard of the wall. He takes two steps toward the hole, looking back once at Tom's bowl now filled with white paint. The camera follows Jerry as he walks slowly toward the mouse hole, cheese clutched in his paws.
text_3: A cozy living room with a patterned rug on the wooden floor and a comfortable armchair near the fireplace. A bookshelf stands against one wall, and a mouse hole is visible in the baseboard. Tom, the blue-gray cat, walks into the room holding his ceramic bowl with 'Tom' written on the side. He sits down on the rug and places the bowl in front of him, unaware that it contains white paint instead of milk. The camera frames Tom in a medium shot as he settles down, his tail curling around his body.
text_4: A cozy living room with a patterned rug on the wooden floor and a comfortable armchair near the fireplace. A bookshelf stands against one wall, and a mouse hole is visible in the baseboard. Tom, the blue-gray cat, sits on the rug with his ceramic bowl in front of him. He lowers his head toward the bowl and takes a big gulp of the white paint, thinking it's milk. The camera moves slightly closer as Tom's eyes widen in shock, his cheeks bulging with the paint he just consumed.
text_5: A cozy living room with a patterned rug on the wooden floor and a comfortable armchair near the fireplace. A bookshelf stands against one wall, and a mouse hole is visible in the baseboard. Tom, the blue-gray cat, sits on the rug with his tongue hanging out, frantically fanning his mouth with both paws. Jerry, the brown mouse, peeks out from his mouse hole in the baseboard, holding his cheese chunk. The camera captures both characters, with Tom in the foreground desperately fanning his burning mouth and Jerry in the background, contentedly nibbling on his cheese.

text_0: A spacious kitchen with white cabinets, gray countertops, and yellow tiled floor stretches across the scene. A refrigerator stands on the left side while a stove sits on the right. Tom, the blue-gray cat, is curled up on a small round pet bed in the corner of the kitchen, sleeping peacefully with his eyes closed and a slight smile on his face. Jerry, the brown mouse, carefully climbs up onto the counter using a kitchen towel hanging down from the edge, carrying nothing in his paws as he glances around cautiously at his surroundings.
text_1: A spacious kitchen with white cabinets, gray countertops, and yellow tiled floor stretches across the scene. A refrigerator stands on the left side while a stove sits on the right. Tom, the blue-gray cat, remains asleep on his round pet bed in the corner, his chest rising and falling slowly with each breath, unaware of any activity around him. Jerry, the brown mouse, stands on the gray countertop beside a large wheel of yellow cheese with small holes, his paws reaching forward to grasp the edge of the cheese as he looks over his shoulder toward the sleeping Tom.
